text:
Don’t Understand
/
歌詞
我是一塊滾石 
I'm a rolling stone 

讓你大吃一驚 
It took you by surprise 

你緊緊抓住某件事，任何事 
You're hangin' onto something, anything 

就像一道微光 
Just like a shimmer of light 

哦，劍怎麼掉了 
Oh, how the sword, it fell 

我說：“你真的很了不起，一切都很棒 
I said, "You're really something, everything 

對我來說，我很冷 
To me, and I'm cold 

所以，抱緊我吧，寶貝”
So hold me closer, baby"
我不明白你為什麼這麼喜歡我 
I don't understand why you like me so much 

因為我不喜歡自己 
'Cause I don't like myself 

我不明白你為什麼這麼喜歡我 
I don't understand why you like me so much 

希望我是別人 
Wish I was someone else 

你說你有一百萬個理由 
You say you got a million reasons 

但我想不出一個 
But I can't think of one 

我不明白你怎麼這麼喜歡我 
I don't understand how you like me so much 

因為我不喜歡自己，嗯嗯
'Cause I don't like myself, mm-mm
我會為你建造一座教堂 
I'll build a church for you 

他們會從方圓數英里而來 
They'll come from miles around 

女孩，你真的很了不起，一切 
Girl, you're really something, everything 

對我來說，我很冷 
To me, and I'm cold 

所以抱緊我吧寶貝
So hold me closer, baby
我不明白你怎麼這麼喜歡我 
I don't understand how you like me so much 

因為我不喜歡自己 
'Cause I don't like myself 

我不明白你怎麼這麼喜歡我 
I don't understand how you like me so much 

希望我是別人 
Wish I was someone else 

你說你有一百萬個理由 
You say you got a million reasons 

但我想不出一個 
But I can't think of one 

我不明白你怎麼這麼喜歡我 
I don't understand how you like me so much 

因為我不喜歡自己，嗯嗯，嗯嗯
'Cause I don't like myself, mm-mm, mm-mm
author: Stanley Kubrick

text:
Don’t Understand
/
I'm a rolling stone
It took you by surprise
You're hangin' onto something, anything
Just like a shimmer of light
Oh, how the sword, it fell
I said, "You're really something, everything
To me, and I'm cold
So hold me closer, baby"
I don't understand why you like me so much
'Cause I don't like myself
I don't understand why you like me so much
Wish I was someone else
You say you got a million reasons
But I can't think of one
I don't understand how you like me so much
'Cause I don't like myself, mm-mm
I'll build a church for you
They'll come from miles around
Girl, you're really something, everything
To me, and I'm cold
So hold me closer, baby
I don't understand how you like me so much
'Cause I don't like myself
I don't understand how you like me so much
Wish I was someone else
You say you got a million reasons
But I can't think of one
I don't understand how you like me so much
'Cause I don't like myself, mm-mm, mm-mm
author: Stanley Kubrick

Eu não entendo como você gosta tanto de mim
I don't understand how you like me so much

Porque eu não gosto de mim mesmo, mm-mm, mm-mm
'Cause I don't like myself, mm-mm, mm-mm

text:
New fan here🩵💚🩵

When I first heard of this guy, I saw pictures and memes about him but never listened to his music. I truly thought he was some mumble trap rap artist or someshit because of y'all. I never gave his music a chance because of this. Well, I've recently started listening to his songs, mainly his acoustics... all I have to say is, wow, I've been missing out. This is why we should never judge a book by its cover, why you shouldn't listen to what other people have to say about someone, why we shouldn't base how we feel about someone/something off of someone else's feelings/opinions towards something/someone. This dude's TALENTED AF. 😈

text: This song screens my mental I am blessed for this sweet sound and melody thank you, I am a cold lost soul just trying to get by in a world that that is cold and dark in itself it’s hard in this day in Ashe for someone like me being 19 almost 20, trying to be a good person and live in the light of the light of the spirit is very hard to do, for me at least, I try to live my life 999 till I’m gone and I’m hoping it’s soon cause this WRLD sure is a cruel place for a genuine gentle souled man not trying to sound like a downer I’m sorry haha that’s just how I feel.. this song just screems my personality because i have worked to change my body to the way I want and I still don’t like the way I look at all or have self confidence so this song just spoke to me I hope you see this and it inspires you! And thank you for reading if you do

[Verse 1]
I'm a rolling stone

You're hangin' onto something, anything
Just like a shimmer of light
Oh, how the sword, it fell
I said, "You're really something, everything
To me, and I'm cold
So hold me closer, baby"

[Chorus]
I don't understand why you like me so much
'Cause I don't like myself
I don't understand why you like me so much
Wish I was someone else
You say you got a million reasons
But I can't think of one
I don't understand why you like me so much
'Cause I don't like myself, mm-mm

[Verse 2]
I'll build a church for you
They'll come from miles around
Girl, you're really somеthing, everything
To me, and I'm cold
So hold mе closer, baby

[Chorus]
I don't understand how you like me so much
'Cause I don't like myself
I don't understand how you like me so much
Wish I was someone else
You say you got a million reasons
But I can't think of one
I don't understand how you like me so much
'Cause I don't like myself, mm-mm, mm-mm

text: Me as an underground artist with a small audience, Post Malone is the type of success story that inspires me. It's been inspiring to see how he's grown in his abilities and steadily exploded after embracing every chance he's been given! With good reason, Mans has swiftly become a hallmark in the music business. I know that if I work hard enough, I can eventually reach a wider audience, but for now, I'm satisfied as a supporter. It'll be my time next. Much respect Post Malone 🔥

text:
Doubt you'll see this, Posty but I am having to put my cat down today. Today will be the worst day of my life. Thank you for making it a little bit easier with the music. ❤️ Ready to just my ball my eyes out today with your music as loud as possible.

EDIT: Made a video of my cats last few days. Feel free to check it out. Thank you everyone for checking the kind messages. It's been over two weeks, and slowly feeling like myself again. Grief is a weird thing.
